fun.1v1.description: Allows viewers to challenge others to 1v1.

timeoutLength.name: Timeout Length
timeoutLength.description: Length in seconds of the timeout for losers (0 to disable)

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number that can get rolled.

blockOverride.name: Block Overriding
blockOverride.description: Don't allow people to provide their own limits.
